Title: Denial
Writer: Deborah Lipstadt (based on the book "History on Trial: My Day in Court with a Holocaust Denier" by), David Hare (screenplay by)
Actors: Rachel Weisz, Tom Wilkinson, Timothy Spall, Andrew Scott
Plot: Acclaimed writer and historian Deborah E. Lipstadt must battle for historical truth to prove the Holocaust actually occurred when David Irving, a renowned denier, sues her for libel.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 nominations.
